channel.description: Recent content in Posts on pluto's blog

item.title: Maven installation and configuration details
item.description: Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project’s build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.

item.title: Welcome to Pluto's blog
item.description: Welcome to my blog. Here I share my learning experience and various open source technologies. General Authors: pluto Version: 21-10-26-BETA Compatibility: Hugo v0.88
